ai-patthana7.6:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles consisting in thoughts.
ai-patthana7.6:1.1_0: without placing the mind and keeping it connected. ...
ai-patthana7.6:3.1_0: nor placing the mind and keeping it connected are not conditions for the sake of applied and sustained thought. Consciousness is a cause of reason.
ai-patthana7.6:4.1_0: forty-four grounds for the sake of these embankments and forty-five objects ...
ai-patthana7.6:4.1_1: forty-four years in the Jeta Grove ...
